channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 04:54 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 04:54 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 02:57 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.

item.title: 游리 02:56 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 02:56 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region.
